articles.author: Aaron Fisher
articles.title: Cameras capture WWII bomb exploding at Japanese airport - CNN
articles.description: A buried American bomb from World War II exploded at a Japanese airport on Wednesday, cancelling more than 80 flights. No injuries were reported, officials told the Associated Press.
articles.content: A buried American bomb from World War II exploded at a Japanese airport on Wednesday, cancelling more than 80 flights. No injuries were reported, officials told the Associated Press.
